subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[live]]; to [[dwell]]; to [[reside]]
# to [[occupy]]; to [[rank]]
# to [[claim]]
# to [[stay]] [[put]]
# [[house]]; [[residence]]; [[dwelling]]
# [[restaurant]]
# 39th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "residence" ([[𝌬]])
